org.mini2Dx.tiled.renderer

Interface TileRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatedTileRenderer, StaticTileRenderer

    public interface TileRenderer
extends com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Common interface for tile renderers

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float delta)
        Updates the Tile frame
        Parameters:
        delta - The time since the last update in seconds

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics g,
          int renderX,
          int renderY)
        Renders the Tile at the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context to use
        renderX - The x coordinate to render at
        renderY - The y coordinate to render at

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics g,
          int renderX,
          int renderY,
          boolean flipH,
          boolean flipV,
          boolean flipD)
        Renders the Tile at the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context to use
        renderX - The x coordinate to render at
        renderY - The y coordinate to render at
        flipH - True if the tile is flipped horizontally
        flipV - True if the tile is flipped vertically
        flipD - True if the tile is flipped (anti) diagonally - rotation

      • getCurrentTileImage

        Sprite getCurrentTileImage()
        Returns the current Tile image
        Returns:
        The current image
